message.subject: Improve Daily Commits page UI/UX and fix sidebar padding
message.body:
- Redesigned daily commits controls with two-card layout
- Enhanced date inputs with better visual design and icons
- Fixed calendar icon visibility in dark theme
- Improved button styling with hover effects
- Added responsive design for mobile devices
- Removed unnecessary 60px padding from sidebar nav-menu
- Better visual hierarchy with card headers and separators
